Job Posting:174767 - Position: W26 Software Developer Intern 174767B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 10/30/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 10/23/2025 04:30 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization City Province / State Country Perseus Group Markham ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description Job Req: R46603 THE POSITION 2026 - Winter W26 Software Developer Intern 174767B Co-op Position Markham, ON Canada 4 months In-Person CAD 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List The successful Software Developer Intern works in our Markham Ontario office and reports to our Solutions Architect for the homebuilding industry's leading-edge enterprise software product. The Software Developer Intern works in a Scrum team to create high performing, resilient and manageable web-based ERP software applications for homebuilders. Responsibilities include: • Hands-on development for homebuilding software solutions of high quality • Collaborating on how to accelerate deliveries within existing staffing. • Caring deeply about homebuilder user experiences, implementations, ongoing operational success, and doing whatever it takes to turn a product that customers need into a product they want for life • Ability to manage work items in tight deadlines • Study and Understand our application's functionality, workflow, and design. • Collect, organize, and preprocess application knowledge • Develop an AI model that can respond to queries about using the application • Implement Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines • Experiment and Track with prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and embeddings to improve relevance and accuracy • Test, evaluate, and refine the model's performance with real-world queries. Document the process and provide recommendations for scaling and future enhancements • Applicants with disabilities who would like to require a reasonable accommodation related to any part of the application process may contact us at Perseus_HR@constellationhbs.com. Job Requirements QUALIFICATIONS AND SKILLS • Be working from the Markham Ontario office • Understanding of software requirements • Experience building multi-tier, distributed web solutions with an emphasis on Responsive Design • Understanding of software development best practices, using a common code repository within a multi developer team environment, effective implementation strategies • Hands-on experience in Full Stack Development: • HTML5, TypeScript, JavaScript, Stylesheets • .NET • SQL Query • Knowledge in Object-Oriented Design • Knowledge in Test Driven Development • Ability to perform Unit Testing as well as Integration Testing Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://talentmanagementsolution.wd3.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/perseus-careers/job/Markham-Ontario--- CAN/Software-Developer-Intern_R46603?source=LinkedIn Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
